sourceOrganization.name: NIAID ICEMR Network
sourceOrganization.abstract: The International Centers of Excellence for Malaria Research (ICEMR) is a global network of research centers in malaria-endemic regions dedicated to understanding, controlling, and preventing malaria. These centers generate critical knowledge and tools to combat malaria effectively.
sourceOrganization.description: The International Centers of Excellence for Malaria Research (ICEMR) network are a global network of independent research centers in malaria-endemic settings, established by NIAID to provide the knowledge, tools, and evidence-based strategies crucial to understanding, controlling, and, ultimately, preventing malaria. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/excellence-malaria-research
alternateName: International Centers of Excellence for Malaria Research
